trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> is using as a view mode.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
Item to create.
The item created.
Gets the control type for the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
A value in the enumeration.
Gets the collection of immediate child elements of the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
Collection of child objects you want to get.
Collection of child objects.
Gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified patternInterface.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
A value in the enumeration.
If patternInterface is or , this method returns an object that implements the control pattern, otherwise this method returns `null`.
Called when the collection of items changes.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
Data associated with the event.
Called when the custom view is no longer applied to the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
The total number of columns in a grid.
Returns the UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.
The UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
The total number of rows in a grid.
Returns a collection of UI Automation providers that represents all the column headers in a table.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableProvider> interface.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
Returns a collection of UI Automation providers that represents all row headers in the table.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableProvider> interface.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
Gets the primary direction of traversal for the table.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableProvider> interface.
The primary direction of traversal.
